Gatsby

Markdown

Poetry

Indenting lines of poetry has been made infinitely easier with the gatsby-remark-bracketed-spans plugin. Class names are handled by the poem.js style sheet, and are injected via brackets in the poem's markdown. So, you can write

- DELAYED till she had ceased to know,  
- Delayed till in its vest of snow  
- [Her loving bosom lay.]{.indent-2}

and get the following:

  • DELAYED till she had ceased to know,
  • Delayed till in its vest of snow
  • Her loving bosom lay.
